greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 3*a(n-1) - 3*a(n-2) + 2*a(n-3).
comment: Sequence identical to its third differences. "Self-transform". Initial terms are transform's coefficients .
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3, -3, 2).
mathematica: LinearRecurrence[{3,-3,2},{2,-3,3},30] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[ (-2+9 x-18 x^2)/(-1+3 x-3 x^2+2 x^3),{x,0,30}],x] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 20 2011 *)
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Dec 07 2007
